foreignData.name: Stechender Feuerfisch
foreignData.text: Immer wenn du deinen ersten Zauberspruch im Zug eines Gegners wirkst, kannst du eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist, tappen oder enttappen.

foreignData.flavorText: Su presa favorita son las estrellas de mar.
foreignData.name: Pez león puntiagudo
foreignData.text: Siempre que lances tu primer hechizo durante el turno de cada oponente, puedes girar o enderezar el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra.

foreignData.flavorText: Les étoiles de mer sont ses proies préférées.
foreignData.name: Rascasse piquante
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez votre premier sort pendant le tour de chaque adversaire, vous pouvez engager ou dégager le permanent non-terrain ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: Le stelle marine sono le sue prede preferite.
foreignData.name: Pesce Scorpione Pungente
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci la tua prima magia durante il turno di ogni avversario, puoi TAPpare o STAPpare un permanente non terra bersaglio.

foreignData.name: 有刺カサゴ
foreignData.text: 対戦相手の各ターン内で初めてあなたが呪文を唱えるたび、土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とする。あなたはそれをタップまたはアンタップしてよもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー・エンチャント — 魚

foreignData.name: 따끔거리는 쏠배감펭
foreignData.text: 당신이 각 상대의 턴 동안 당신의 첫 주문을 발동할 때마다, 대지가 아닌 지속물을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 그 지속물을 탭하거나 언탭할 수 있다.

foreignData.flavorText: As estrelas-do-mar são suas presas favoritas.
foreignData.name: Peixe-leão Pontiagudo
foreignData.text: Toda vez que você conjura sua primeira mágica durante o turno de cada oponente, você pode virar ou desvirar a permanente alvo que não seja um terreno.

foreignData.name: Жалящая Крылатка
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете ваше первое заклинание во время хода каждого из оппонентов, вы можете повернуть или развернуть целевой не являющийся землей перманент.

foreignData.name: 螯刺狮鱼
foreignData.text: 每当你施放每个对手回合中你的第一个咒语时，你可以横置或重置目标非地永久物。

foreignData.name: 螯刺獅魚
foreignData.text: 每當你施放每個對手回合中你的第一個咒語時，你可以橫置或重置目標非地永久物。

name: Stinging Lionfish
originalText: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when you cast a spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

This ability triggers only on your very first spell during an opponent’s turn, not the first spell after the card is on the battlefield. If you cast a spell before it’s on the battlefield (including if you cast this card somehow during an opponent’s turn), the ability won’t trigger.
If you have more than one opponent, this ability can trigger once during each of those opponents’ turns.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, this ability triggers no more than once during each opposing team’s turn.

text: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.
